The claim made by President Obama that: the average minimum wage worker is 35 years old" was analyzed and fact-checked by experts.
The experts referred to a study conducte: EPI) to verify the accuracy of the claim.
The EPI study considered individuals ear: 11.10 per hour, which is $1 more than Obama's proposed minimum wage level of $10.10.
The study found that the average age of: 11.10 was indeed 35 years old, supporting the claim made by President Obama.
